Posted By: Jimi
Looking to start this set from scratch and really only want SGC graded cards unless you have nice looking raw cards for trade/sale in which there would no worries of trimmed cards when sending in to SGC.  I have NO T201s right now, so ANY grade in an SGC holder would be cool!  Thanks!

Jimi
